content: Can you provide an update on the refund?
We need more details about the bug report.
Please confirm the laptop model for procurement.
Has the software license been approved?
Follow-up on refund request, any updates?
Bug fix verified. Closing the issue.
Hardware request approved, moving to procurement.
Security tool review completed, awaiting final approval.
The refund delay was due to missing information.
The bug has been escalated, expect resolution soon.
